TSUL DANG 'DI NYIN NAS GZIMS

DPON DGE SLONG DON GRUB PAS RDOR SLOB BYAS PA'I BUM SGRUB, BDUN
PHRAG BAR TSUGS, 'DI SKABS GSER

GDUNG GI SGO KHYIM GYI PHRAR SKU RGYAN SGRON PA'I DUS KUN GYI
MIG SNGAR MTHONG BAR RDZONG MA'I STENG 'JA'

SPUNGS CHE BA DANG, DE NAS RIM PAR NUB PHYOGS SU PHYIN PA'I GSER
GDUNG THAD KYI NAM MKHA' 'JA'

GUR KHYON CHE BA YUN SHIN TU RING BA'I MTHAR LAG PHAN TSUN LHO
BYANG DU BRKYANG BA BCAS LTAS DANG GSER

GDUNG THOG GI GDUNG SHAR MA NYIS GSHIBS KYI NOR BU'I RI MO'I
DBUS NAS SHA MO SKYES PA ZHAG SHAS NAS

JE CHER SONG BA'I CHE BA KHA ZHENG MKHYID GANG TZAM GNYIS KYI
BAR DANG CHUNG BA KHA ZHENG SOR BZHI TZAM GCIG

KUN GYI LTAR SNANG GDUGS RIM

RING PO'I BAR DU BSDAD PA'I NGO MTSAR BA DU

TSIGS SU BCAD PA'O,

PHEBS KHUL BYAS, TSES GSUM LA 'PHAGS MCHOG LO KE SHVA RA DANG
NANG RTEN (238 NA) BRJOD MA MKHAS

PA BZHIN RNAMS TSOMS CHEN DU GDAN DRANGS PA'I TSES BZHI RES GZA'
DANG BYED PA RAGS ZHIB MTHUN

PAR GZA' MIG DMAR, DUS SBYOR LUG GI TATKAL RANG KHYIM DANG, LAS
SKAR LAG ,ZLA SNYIGS ZHIG PA

'BAR BA SOGS DRAG PO'I LAS LA SHIS PA'I GZA' TSES KYI THOG NAS
DGE SLONG 'JAM DBYANGS GRAGS

PAS RDO RJE SLOB DPON BYAS TE TSOMS CHEN SRID ZHI'I PHUN TSOGS
SU GRVA TSANG YONGS RDZOGS KYIS BYANG

GTER PHUR PA LHA NAG GI SGRUB MCHOD RDUL TSON GYI DKYIL 'KHOR LA
BRTEN PA TSUGS PA'I DE NYID DU RTZA

'CHAMS BSTAR BA NGED RANG NAS KYANG RTOG PA BCUG ,RJE BLA MA
ZHING PHEBS DE'I DGONGS PA RDZOGS PA'I

MCHOD SDONG SOGS 'BYONGS, NGED RANG YANG NA TSOD BZHI BCU ZHE
GRANGS SLEBS SNYAM PA'I 'CHAMS KYI

BGEGS SKROD GONG TZAM SKYO SNANG CHE BA BYUNG, BGEGS SKROD DUS
RANG GIS 'DUN PA DRAG TU BGYIS PA RNAM

GTER LUNG SOGS NAS LUNG GIS (380 BA) BSTAN TSUL, NGES DON SANGS
RGYAS 'PHAGS PA KHO NA DANG

MTSUNGS PA'I GZIGS PA RNAM PA LNGA DANG BLTAMS PA'I GZA' SKAR
SOGS CHA PHRA MOS KYANG DBYE BA MED

CING MDZAD PA'I RAGS SDOMS BCU GNYIS SU STON PA LA SOGS PA THO
LONG TZAM BKOD PA'I MU MTHUD DU

RNAM PAR THAR PA RJE BLA MA NYID KYIS RTZA BA NAS ZIN BYANG YANG
MA GNANG BA'I RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I

LCAGS BYA ZLA BA DGU PA'I TSES BRGYAD MAN RNAMS DU K'U LA POD
DRUG GA'I DON BSDU TSIGS BCAD MA'I

DON RDO RAGS RIM SRUBS 'JUG GI BAR SKABS KYI TSIGS BCAD LA BCUG
PA LAS GZHAN MA BZANG NGAN

MTHA' DAG GSAL DRANG DU BRJOD PA DU K'U LA'I MU MTHUD KHO NA LAS
LA LA'I RNAM PAR THAR PA LUGS KYI

LEGS CHA RNAMS BKOD CIG SHOS SBAS PA MA YIN PAR BSGRIGS SHING,
CHU KHYI DAG PA'I ZHING DU GSHEGS

PA NAS BZUNG TSANG MA GTANG RAG PHYIR GSHOL BA'I RAB BYUNG BCU
GNYIS PA'I SHING PHAG HOR ZLA BCU GCIG

@516 PA'I GNAM GANG YAN MU MTHUD DU 'DRI DGOS GSHIS RES KHO BO'I
RTOGS BRJOD LTA BU DANG, RES KUN

RDZOB DGOS DBANG GI RIGS KYANG JI SNYED 'DRI DGOS PA BCAS HA
CANG 'GANG GTZANG RE MTHUN ZHIG MA

BYUNG RUNG DU K'U LA KA KHA GA GSUM GYI MU MTHUD DU NGA CA CHA'I
GLEGS BAM GSUM PO 'DI DAG DKAR CHAG

SOGS DANG SPEL GSHIS LO NGO LNGA DANG RIL PO PHYED BZHI TZAM
'THOGS PA'I RGYAL BA NYI MA'I GNYEN GRONG

KHYER RTZVA CAN DU GZUGS SKU'I BKOD PA BSDUS NAS BGRANG BYA NYIS
STONG LNGA BRGYA DON DRUG ,SNANG BA MTHA'

YAS KYI THUGS RJE'I RANG GZUGS NYE LAM 'BRAS BU'I THEG PA'I RTZE
MO STON (381 NA) CHED SINDHU RGYA MTSOR

PADMA'I SBUBS SU BRDZUS TE BLTAMS NAS NYIS STONG LNGA BRGYA DON
GNYIS, GANGS CAN GYI LJONGS SU PHEBS

NAS DGU BRGYA ZHE BDUN, RGYAL BLON SNGA DAR GYI DUS, ZAN G-YANG
MI 'GYUR LHUN GRUB BTAB NAS DGU

BRGYA ZHE LNGA DANG, PHYI DAR GYI GTZO BO 'JAM MGON ZUR PHUD
LNGA PA 'DUL BA DANG STONG NYID KYI BSTAN PA SPEL

BAR NGUR SMRIG GAR GYIS ROL CHED BTZONG KHA'I YUL DU BLTAMS NAS
SUM BRGYA DANG SO DGU RDZOGS PA'I

SANGS RGYAS 'OD ZER KUN 'PHAGS DPAL BRTZEGS RGYAL PO SDOM BRTZON
RGYAL PO'I TSUL 'DZIN PA RJE BLA

MA CHEN PO LNGA PA RTAG 'DZIN CAN RNAMS CHOS LA BSKUL BA'I PHYIR
MDZAD PA'I THA MA RNGA CHEN GYI LO DBO ZLA'I

MAR NGO'I DUS CHEN LA BSTAN NAS BGRANG BYA MA NU DANG, BDAG SOGS
GDUL BYA'I LEGS BYAS CHEN PO'I

STOBS KYIS DRANGS PA'I THUGS RJE'I RANG GZUGS DRUG PA SMYOS
GDUNG CHEN POR BLTAMS NAS MYOS BYED,

THUN MONG DRANG DON DANG BSTUN PA'I LNGA PA'I BSAG SBYANG GI
CHED MCHOD SBYIN GYI DUS STON CHEN PO TSOGS

MCHOD GSHEGS PA'I LO ZLA'I DUS CHEN DANG BSTUN TSUGS NAS ZUNG,
DE DAG GI MCHOD YUL GTZO BO

'DZAM GLING RGYAN GCIG RTEN BRTEN PA RAB GNAS KYIS MTHA' BRTAN
'BYONGS NAS 'OD DKAR CAN

DUS BZHI'I RTZOD LDAN MNGON PAR

DANG THAR PA SGRUB PA LA 'DUN PAS SGRUB

'DAS TE BSLAB PA TSUL KHRIMS KYI LNGA
